text: College Chums is a 1907 American silent comedy movie directed by Edwin S. PorterCollege ChumsDru Jeffries. Comic Book Film Style: Cinema at 24 Panels per Second and stars Miss Acton, Miss Antoinette, and Edward Boulden. ==Cast== * Miss Acton * Miss Antoinette * Edward Boulden * Katherine Griffith * Mr. Kennedy * Mr. Kurtis ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:American movies Category:1907 movies Category:American comedy movies Category:American silent movies
title: College Chums
